summary: This is an email from attorney Mariann Wang to Gloria Allred, dated March 17, 2021, regarding a new survivor of Jeffrey Epstein who wishes to share her information. The survivor was abused by Epstein on one occasion in 2004, and Wang inquires about adding her to an existing arrangement scheduled for April 1, 2021.

persons.name: Mariann Wang
persons.context: Sender of the email, representing a survivor of Jeffrey Epstein and reaching out to Gloria Allred to coordinate sharing the survivor's information.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Recipient of the email, being contacted by Mariann Wang regarding a new survivor client who was abused by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator who abused the survivor on one occasion in 2004.

keyFacts: A new survivor of Jeffrey Epstein came forward in March 2021, alleging abuse by him on one occasion in 2004.
Attorney Mariann Wang contacted attorney Gloria Allred to coordinate sharing the survivor's information, referencing a date of April 1, 2021.
The document is a direct communication between legal representatives, indicating ongoing legal activity related to Epstein survivors years after his death.
